comment.author: 61806676@N00
comment._content: Fantastic collection. I'm wondering if Keith took this photo: of my grandfather. He grew up at 5th and Spring Garden.

comment.author: 26491575@N05
comment._content: Thanks for sharing this great photo, Melody, and I apologize for the delayed response.  I ran this by the person who processed the collection and she said the Keith photographs in our collection are on postcard backs so it would be an unusual shot for Keith, but you never know!  Does the backside have any additional notes or is it a postcard back?
